mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT_FORM ( ID, PATH, TITLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DOCUMENT_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, STAFF_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_DOCUMENT_FORM_ID.nextval, #{path}, #{title}, sysdate, sysdate, #{document_type},'2','24')
mapper.select: SELECT DOC.ID ID, DOC.PATH PATH, DOC.TITLE TITLE, DOC.CREATED_AT CREATED_AT, DOC.UPDATED_AT UPDATED_AT, DOC.DOCUMENT_TYPE DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOC.COMPANY_ID COMPANY_ID, SF.NAME NAME FROM DOCUMENT_FORM DOC INNER JOIN STAFF SF ON DOC.STAFF_ID = SF.ID ORDER BY DOC.ID DESC
